website_summaries.verdict: This popular jacket is recognized for its remarkable value amidst incredible functionality.
pros: Buyers raved over the jacket's chic style and affordable price
Thick neoprene layer keeps you impressively warm
Extremely flexible, especially in the arm area
cons: Not the best option for petite women

customer_reviews.title: Order up 2 sizes!!
customer_reviews.text: Size up! A lot! I am 5'6" 170 lbs and usually wear a size L, sometimes XL, size 12, sometimes 14. Based on info posted and reviews, ordered a size 12... Huge mistake! I want to try the size 14 but I'm not even sure that will fit! It actually hurt my arms to wear it was so tight. I was able to zip it, but the fit was comical to say the least! However, the sleeves were plenty long - I did see short sleeves as one review. They would NOT have been a problem, had it fit! It also seemed like a nicely-made jacket.
customer_reviews.author: SDOBB

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and flexibility for swimming.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" measurements are 36"/26"/36" I ordered a size 4 the fit was great. Worked great for snorkeling and kept me warm. It had great flexibility in the arms to swim and the nice tight fit to keep water out.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Water Aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 12 shirt, sometimes 10, so I ordered a 3XL based on reviews saying it fit very very small, I had to return. It got very large in the water and I was swimming in it. One size down to 2L and it's been great. East to get on, keeps you very warm, and easy to peel off. Looks amazing too, very flattering.
customer_reviews.author: CRKing

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this wetsuit jacket and it fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wetsuit jacket and it fit perfectly. I am 5'2" and 120lbs with a fairly petite figure and this top fit exactly how I needed it to. It was tight and kept me very warm on our trip to the Georgian Bay where the water was 56F. It was the only reason I could tolerate being in such cold water and not have my muscles cramp up. The fit is very flattering and it looks super cute on.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Heale

customer_reviews.title: Water Sports or cold water diving
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece but it was heavier than I anticipated. I was looking for something thinner that would add a little warmth when I lake swim. I haven't had much luck finding anything with the appropriate level of neoprene.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stretches when wet more than other wet suits I ...
customer_reviews.text: This stretches when wet more than other wet suits I have owned,,,,it is also rather loose around the sleeves so not tight for keeping water out.
customer_reviews.author: discerning shopper

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I teach swim lessons in a cold pool. On days when I teach one or two lessons I'm fine with my suit but on Saturdays I'm in the water for 5 hours straight or more. I don't really get to swim around either, I just have to stand there with little kids. It gets REALLY cold really fast. This wetsuit jacket has been a lifesaver. When everyone else is complaining about the cold water and air I'm nice and cozy in this!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this wetsuit! Perfect for my chilly morning water aerobics in my backyard pool. I workout out in 55-63° water temps and needed something to help keep the warmth in and maybe sweat a little and this is it. I'm normally a size 12 as I am larger in the breast area so I ordered the XXL (size 14) and it fits great for the most part. A little loose in the stomach area and the arms are a little too long but I just roll them. So far I highly recommend this wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Nsmith0104

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lightweight wetsuit to wear kayaking, as I am always cold in the water. This worked perfectly for me. I also liked that it was completely separate from the bottoms I bought, so I could easily go to the bathroom. My daughter bought a one piece suit and although hers was heavier, and therefore warmer, it was a royal pain for her to remove it when nature called.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit zip up jacket
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as we were going on vacation and sometimes while snorkeling in the pacific, after a while I start getting chilly in the water and I have a short wetsuit & it’s so difficult to get it on (I always need assistance), so I decided to order the zip up jacket to keep my core warmer - it was PERFECT. wonderful purchase, worked as expected and exceeded all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Overall great value
customer_reviews.text: Fit really well around the waist. The wrist was a bit loose. The neck area was too tight. I liked it though. it does a very good job keeping the body warm and saves me the trouble of applying sunscreen so I don't need to feel guilty about destroying coral reefs when I go snorkeling
customer_reviews.author: Ng Meowster

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket, I just wish it was a tad bit longer in the sleeve and torso. The material is nice and thick and it will do what it is supposed to though, just a tad short
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Yes, slightly small
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 3 stars because I haven't worn the one I kept in the water yet. I'm 5'5" and 160 pounds, but muscular pounds. Size 40 bust. I could have worn the size 12, but the size 14 was more comfortable. And, yes, they charge $7.50 to return.
customer_reviews.author: RKL

customer_reviews.title: Fit Should Be Tight for Warmth
customer_reviews.text: Regarding sizing - be aware that your fit should be extremely tight to the point of being uncomfortable which to will water from coming in between the jacket and your skin. This is what will keep you warm while swimming. When you get in the water the fabric will loosen up and is much more comfortable than when it's dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ame

customer_reviews.title: Usually wear XL, 3XL fit perfect! I'm 5'9 and the arms fit well in the pits and wrists.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I read the reviews regarding size; bought a 3X, usually wear a XLG. This fit's quite snug, but perfect in every way. I assume it will stretch a bit when wet. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this!  Good relatively inexpensive option!
customer_reviews.text: I got this wetsuit top for kayaking when the temps are a bit chilly and the water is still cold, in case of any spills. It fits well and looks flattering, which I love on my apple shaped figure. Seems to be well made, but I also wouldn't know the difference as I've never owned any name brands. It suits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal V

customer_reviews.title: Zipper dug into my neck
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking wetsuit top and it fit correctly. However, the neck/zipper hit me wrong and dug into my neck. The neck was also quite wide. It might just be my anatomy as I am quite thin with a very skinny neck. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: LKW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit! Disappointed in quality...
customer_reviews.text: Don't be afraid to order your typical size. Fits as expected. Tight first zip, but does not wear well. Lemorecn Women’s 1.5mm Wetsuits Jacket Long Sleeve Neoprene Wetsuits Top (2047black8). I received this item 3/5/19. Since 3/6/19 I have been wearing this wetsuit jacket 5 days a week in an indoor pool. I rinse the jacket daily in warm water and hang to drip dry. The outside skin is puckering. The black color has turned ashen. The other colors are muted. The quality is inferior. I wish I could return it. I have written an unfavorable review regarding product on Amazon. It appears the nylon outer coating is inferior.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Schmierer

customer_reviews.title: So good! So affordable! So worth the buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to the Faulkland Islands and it's going to be cold. The moment I tried this top on I felt so comfortably warm and the fit is so flattering. I highly recommend this to anybody who wants a swim top that's going to keep them toasty while in the water. It's also very fashionable. The color combination is nice as well. Solid material. And you can't beat the price. High quality. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney D.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Runs extremely small if you wear a 4 order an 8. If you wear an 8 order a 12
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fits very nicely but I'm still cold in the pool
customer_reviews.text: It fits very nicely but I'm still cold in the pool. It's just me - most people are fine. Perhaps I should have gotten a thicker mm.?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I swim all year round in the sea and so this is perfect as the water temp drops. I love everything about it. I got too small a size originally and had to re-order (I had to pay for shipping of the return) but I am well pleased with the second one. I wear it over a shorty wet suit and with neoprene leggings. perfect combo.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: It runs soooo small
customer_reviews.text: It is not what I expected. I was so small I could not zip it. I weigh less than 100 lbs. usually nothing is too small but this was so stiff, and small I didn't bother. It felt very thick to me.
customer_reviews.author: i1der2

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'4", 112lbs, 32 bust, 28 waist and it fit me pretty snug outside of water. I could not zip it all the way up because it was hard to breathe. Maybe when I wear it in water I'll be able to zip it up all the way. I'm glad I bought this for more cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for .
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift for my mother. She was looking for a jacket to exercise in the pool. This was a bit too heavy for that and not chlorine safe...I am still looking.
customer_reviews.author: carol r

customer_reviews.title: Check the size chart.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you check the size chart and order accordingly. If you do, it'll be the perfect fit. Just took a trip to the Oregon coast and wore this boogie boarding all day. It kept me warm and looked really cute. I highly recommend this top!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is SO wrong
customer_reviews.text: Very nice material. It was actual neoprene! However, I gave 2 stars for the sizing. It's way off! I usually wear a size 4 or 6 in everything, and I even followed the size chart but this jacket was so small I couldn't move my arms or zip it!!!
customer_reviews.author: KathyP

customer_reviews.title: Sized up one size for a perfect fit... excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8 for tops, but having read other reviews purchased a size 10 and it was perfect. Really nice quality--highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth JM

customer_reviews.title: I bought the largest size I could find
customer_reviews.text: It's a little tight around the waist but I can get into it. The sleeves are a little too long. I took a trip to FL and tried it out in the cold ocean and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: cozykat

customer_reviews.title: arms not a great fit
customer_reviews.text: the quality of this product is good - feels soft and the seams are as they should be. We did however return the product as my wife found it simply to tight in the armpit area and the arms length was about an 1" too short. The bodice fit well. She wears a regular size 0 (or petite size small) with 34C chest and purchased size 4
customer_reviews.author: greg vance

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for water aerobics in an outside pool for the cooler days in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: After viewing other choices, this was the best one
customer_reviews.text: Worked great as a wetsuit and a jacket. Bought a different brand of pants to go with it. Usually take a small but by this only came in a medium or larger. The medium fit as described and worked well with a swimsuit under it. Washes well too and dries fast.
customer_reviews.author: DMKS

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors , great feel
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket and I like the colors even more in person. The sleeps are a little short but nothing too bad. Great price. It arrived a bit later than expected,but then again I did order it only a few days before Christmas so I was kinda expecting that. I put fit as expected because it does if nicely but if you run on the higher end of you size or are not comfortable with tight clothing I might oder a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done!
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear a one-piece wet suit. A two-piece is a lot easier to get into. And I appreciate how comfortable this jacket is and it's nice design. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Myrna from CA

customer_reviews.title: strong off gassing
customer_reviews.text: I bought large and good thing - runs very small. Smelled so bad I had to let air out in garage all winter, about 3-4 months, before I could even think of using it, so could not use it during spring. Will see how it works in fall.
customer_reviews.author: chakeetah

customer_reviews.title: My actual size was the way to go for me. Sizing up was too large.
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a size 4 (5'2', 108 lbs, 34, 27, 35) I ordered a size 8 because according to the size chart, it would be the best fit. It turned out to be too big for me. I let my girlfriend have it because it fit her perfectly and I didn't want to deal with returns. She is a size 8, 145 lbs. I then ordered myself a size 4 and it fits perfectly. The material seems of good quality. Consider ordering your actual size.
customer_reviews.author: Iraida A. Montijo

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I like this jacket. It fits snugly, but as expected and keeps me warm while swimming in my local pool during the winter months in AZ. I like the slim look you get from the black with light blue sides design.
customer_reviews.author: Mary V.

customer_reviews.title: Better than a full suit. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It fits great, keeps me warm. I'm able to move well ,as I used it for water aerobics outdoors. It's also very cute. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, flattering, warm!
customer_reviews.text: love this! I am 5’8” and wear a size 10/12. Medium fit me perfectly! It was very warm when I wore it for night snorkeling in Cozumel in March. Would definitely recommend if you need a bit more coverage in cooler water!
customer_reviews.author: Livia Songster

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: The wet suit top did fit, however based on the size chart the top does run small. I was still able to use the item just wished it would have been a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal

customer_reviews.title: Look at the size chart but consider ordering a size larger
customer_reviews.text: I use this jacket playing water volleyball when it is cold. I am 5’9” so ordered size more according to my height. I chose a 10 but would normally wear an 8 and it fits. The bottom of the jacket could be a little tighter as it folds up when I am jumping up and down in the water. I am however very happy with the product! Great quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: shar

customer_reviews.title: It Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once before our swimming moved inside, but it got the job nicely and fits well. My only disappointment is that the collar of the jacket tends to scratch my jawline but someone with a longer neck than mine may not experience that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Decorator_Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Material seems durable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality. The sizes are deceiving. I had to order three sizes to get the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me nice and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job at keeping me warm. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BeckyM

customer_reviews.title: Great product it runs very very small
customer_reviews.text: Great product it runs very very small so size up but it’s good quality nice look would recommend just size up
customer_reviews.author: James W. Wahab

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the size
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors however, the size runs small. If, the jacket had a tall section it would of been nice. IF it was just a little longer in the sleeves and torso I would of worn it. As it was I gave it to another instructor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality. Better than I expected for the price. I normally wear a size 2 or 4 but ordered a larger size (8) based on people saying they ran small and I wanted to wear it over another wetsuit. The arms fit but the waist is loose. I'm about 5'5" and 125 lb but sleeves on women's clothing tend to be tight on me. I would prefer it to be tighter at the waist to be warmer but I didn't want to order a smaller size and have the arms be too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Schell

customer_reviews.title: We love them! Although we have very different body styles ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought myself and a friend each one of these in different colors for water aerobics this winter. We love them! Although we have very different body styles they stretch enough that the same size fit both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Attractive wetsuit jacket reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive wet suit jacket, and was reasonably priced as compared to other alternatives we looked at. I plan to wear it snorkeling but haven't done so yet, so can't report on how well it performs in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but order up a few sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Great style and colors, true to picture. Normally I'm size 8, maybe 10 as I'm busty so I ordered as others suggested - several sizes up, actually 14. Glad I read reviews as it fits well, snug as it should be and look forward to using! Just wish the manufacturers were more sensitive to women and clothing sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Seeley

customer_reviews.title: The best distributors for quality and attention
customer_reviews.text: I will continue buying here, I liked their colors, how comfortable the garments
customer_reviews.author: maria rocio zenteno

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and made well!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2" 36DD and I ordered a size 10. If fit great and is made well.
customer_reviews.author: jmbet

customer_reviews.title: I normally wear a small but the medium fit great Really helps in the water aerobics class when outside ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a small but the medium fit great Really helps in the water aerobics class when outside temps are chilly.
customer_reviews.author: Skulwin

customer_reviews.title: Good value; great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with quality and brightness of colors! Stitched well and fits perfectly. After reading reviews, I moved up in size from a usual 6-8 medium to a 10. It is a perfect fit so definitely consider going larger.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wetsuit.....love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it.... I bought it to wear in my swimming pool when the water is less than 80 degrees. I like warm water but the convenience of this top allows me to swim more!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: SO Worth the investment!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well-works well to keep me warm in the water, hips upward, when the water temp is cooler than I prefer! A great investment, as it allowed me to get into the pool. If I didn't have it, I wouldn't have gone into the pool on some days, and I like my exercise!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Garrity

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I just got this item and I was happy with the fit and the feel. I haven't tried it out in the water yet but I'm thinking that it will be very comfy for snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for surf lessons and loved it! It’s well made, looks and fits well. You can stay warm, avoid a rash and/or a sun burn
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M.

customer_reviews.title: Must have to keep the chill out!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wetsuit jacket!! Have been searching for one that fits comfortably, easy to get on and off, and of course keep me warm. Brought this for a sailing trip through the BVI. I get cold ridiculously easy. This kept me in the water for hours snorkeling, scuba diving, and paddle boarding. I brought both sizes, 8 and 10 because I was unsure. 8 felt a little snug so I went with the 10. I am almost 5'10'', 140 lbs. Felt the 10 was a little longer. Did not ride up. Dried fast, and kept it's shape. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pawsfuradventure

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great way to start the pool season early regardless of water temperature. This fit as expected. Provides a layer of insulation as a wet suit typically does (Ie. Water does swap under the suit), but it insulates and provides buoyancy. Plus, no need for sunblock! I’ve used mine every day to swim 20lengths come rain or shine.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my granddaughter be able to use the spa and garden hose in the winter time. She’s autistic and loves water! . She has no problem with this jacket and it seems comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Woods

customer_reviews.title: Wetsuit Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice Jacket, good quality, runs way too small. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: leezasez

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: works wonderfully, buy one size larger, DO NOT DRY IN DRYER!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Etheriedge

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Like the thickness it’s perfect for active wear but really small fitting. Had to return because it’s too small.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie

customer_reviews.title: Dive jacket
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job! Very nice jacket, it fits me well. Seems true to measurements.
customer_reviews.author: lovesamazon

customer_reviews.title: The suit is great for early Spring and Fall swimming but it was ...
customer_reviews.text: The suit is great for early Spring and Fall swimming but it was necessary to replace it with a larger size as it runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Edmour Blouin

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit jacket- lov iet
customer_reviews.text: One of the best scuba suit purchases. Reasonable price. I wear it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia gould

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: A little wide over the hips for my build, so cold water comes in there. Super useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality material suit and not to thin. Zippers well-reinforced. Arms are a little smaller with minimal stretch and will cause extra fabric to crease it armpit. May want to order next size up.
customer_reviews.author: M. Benton

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly product. Super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Very good material, size fit. Help me to get back to swim daily
customer_reviews.author: Winnie Quyen Tran

customer_reviews.title: Run tight
customer_reviews.text: I had to order 2 size up Fullness in my middle (ha ha) Quality is outstanding Can ' t wait to test it out In 50 * waters...
customer_reviews.author: SUE HOAGLAND

customer_reviews.title: Feels great! I used it in the Bahamas
customer_reviews.text: Feels great ! I used it in the Bahamas ! Great Wetsuit for someone who just wanted to see how scuba diving in cold water feels like !
customer_reviews.author: Remelyn Stanley

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: My wife is 5 foot 3 and 128 lbs and they fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Useful jacket for water
customer_reviews.text: The wetsuit jacket was sturdy and fit. Very useful and cute, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: The colors were not too bright but fun for summer
customer_reviews.text: The fit was close fitting which I wanted for a wetsuit jacket. The colors were not too bright but fun for summer. I had good movement in it, but have not yet tried it out yet for warmth. I got it for the cooler waters in the lake this summer. In all I am very excited to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Nenan

customer_reviews.title: The jacket is of very good quality. It arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is of very good quality. It arrived quickly, the fit was as I expected. I will definitely buy this item again when I need another one. The fit is comfortable and it looks good. Keeps me warm on cold days when I am in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, and it keeps my arms warm without constraint.
customer_reviews.author: joe b.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this wetsuit top. It looks nice and fits perfectly. I use it for surfing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Love it, great fit, seems to be of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Fostersbeach

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wetsuit jacket - the colors are fun. It was thick enough to keep me warm in the Caribbean waters on a cruise excursion in February (I tend to get cold). My only issue with the fit is that I'm petite and it ran long. The bottom kept flipping up and wouldn't lay flat over my hips, so I flipped it up and just went with it. From a distance it didn't look like it was flipped up. I'd like it if it ran shorter in length.
customer_reviews.author: H. Manley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my jacket - keeps me warm when doing pool exercises during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jayjay

customer_reviews.title: Fit and color, ordered one size up
customer_reviews.text: Strong chemical odor but should be ok outside the swimming pool
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Handerhan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: The fiancé loves it! Fit perfectly and keeps her warm the whole time. I was shocked the quality was so high vs the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan d.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me warm, and it fits!
customer_reviews.text: Has allowed me to do water aerobics during the winter outdoors in N. California.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lehr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little tight in the shoulders. It does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect after I changed it to bigger size. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality
customer_reviews.text: Tried it on today when my jacket arrived. Fits great. Cant wait to get my next winter kayak in! I'll be warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Randolph-Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Fits tight when dry but perfect once wet
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat too big once it gets wet so I ordered the next smaller size. Fits tight when dry but perfect once wet. Really makes water aerobics enjoyable since our pool room is quite cool. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality jacket
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this jacket. It is right to size, and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer, GA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very happy with the fit, the style, and the colors.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I ordered one size more and it fit perfectly, I couldn’t believe it! Nicely packaged too. Very flattering and comfortable, perfect for snorkeling. Highly recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: V. V

product_meta.title: Lemorecn Women’s 1.5mm Wetsuits Jacket Long Sleeve Neoprene Wetsuits Top
feature_bullets: MULTI-USE: Designed to keep you warm in the coldest conditions for diving, paddleboarding, kiteboarding, wakeboarding, kayaking, canoeing and other water sports
DURABILITY: Spot taped at stress points and flatlock seams provide a smooth interior and exterior surface to ensure maximum comfort and durability
ZIPPER: Heavy duty YKK Front zipper is designed to allows for easy entry and exit

Three layers of diving fabrics, the outer is imported nylon fabric, it is high elastic and durable; the middle insulation is neoprene, it is high scalability, waterproof and heat insulation; the inner is thickened 1.5mm SCR mercerized cloth, soft close skin heating to keep warm,it is close skin and comfertable sfot warm
